mykonos.name: Ornos Beach
mykonos.description: South-facing bay, completely sheltered from Meltemi winds. Perfect for families.

mykonos.name: Platis Gialos
mykonos.description: Large sandy beach protected by natural bay formation. Water sports available.

mykonos.name: Psarou Beach
mykonos.description: Famous beach with partial Meltemi protection. Luxury beach clubs.

mykonos.name: Paradise Beach
mykonos.description: Party beach, very exposed to north winds. Better for parties than swimming.

mykonos.name: Super Paradise
mykonos.description: Famous party beach with some wind protection from surrounding hills.

santorini.name: Kamari Beach
santorini.description: East coast black sand beach, Mesa Vouno mountain blocks Meltemi perfectly.

santorini.name: Perissa Beach
santorini.description: Protected by dramatic cliffs from northern winds. Black sand, crystal waters.

santorini.name: Red Beach
santorini.description: Red cliffs provide natural windbreak. Unique volcanic landscape.

santorini.name: Vlychada Beach
santorini.description: Lunar-like landscape with excellent wind protection. Marina nearby.

paros.name: Parikia Beach
paros.description: West-facing town beach, Meltemi actually helps cool the area. Easy access.

paros.name: Logaras Beach
paros.description: South coast gem, completely sheltered from Meltemi. Peaceful atmosphere.

paros.name: Chrysi Akti
paros.description: Famous windsurfing beach - avoid during strong Meltemi for swimming.

paros.name: Farangas Beach
paros.description: Small south coast cove with excellent protection. Rock formations.

naxos.name: Agia Anna
naxos.description: Perfect family beach, south-west facing bay. Shallow waters.

naxos.name: Plaka Beach
naxos.description: West coast - partially protected by dunes from Meltemi. Long sandy stretch.

naxos.name: Mikri Vigla
naxos.description: Prime kitesurfing spot - very windy during Meltemi season.

naxos.name: Agios Prokopios
naxos.description: Award-winning beach with excellent protection. Crystal clear waters.

ios.name: Mylopotas Beach
ios.description: Main beach, can get choppy during Meltemi. Long sandy beach.

ios.name: Manganari Beach
ios.description: South coast paradise, completely protected from Meltemi. Crystal clear waters.

ios.name: Koumbara Beach
ios.description: Secluded beach with moderate protection. Popular with locals.

milos.name: Sarakiniko
milos.description: Unique white moon-like landscape. Some wind protection from rock formations.

milos.name: Klima Beach
milos.description: Colorful fishing village bay, perfect Meltemi shelter. Photogenic houses.

milos.name: Firopotamos
milos.description: Small cove with crystal waters, excellent protection. Traditional village.

milos.name: Tsigrado Beach
milos.description: Hidden gem accessed by rope ladder. Complete wind protection.

syros.name: Galissas Beach
syros.description: West coast bay with excellent Meltemi protection. Family-friendly.

syros.name: Kini Beach
syros.description: Northwest facing bay, great sunset and Meltemi shelter. Tavernas.

syros.name: Vari Beach
syros.description: Sheltered bay perfect during Meltemi season. Sandy beach.

tinos.name: Kolympithra Beach
tinos.description: Two connected bays, choose the calmer side based on wind direction.

tinos.name: Livada Beach
tinos.description: South coast gem with excellent Meltemi protection. Long sandy beach.

tinos.name: Agios Fokas
tinos.description: Southeast facing with partial wind protection. Close to town.

andros.name: Batsi Beach
andros.description: West coast fishing village bay, perfect shelter from Meltemi. Restaurants.

andros.name: Golden Beach
andros.description: East coast - stunning but very windy during Meltemi. Better in calm conditions.

andros.name: Agios Petros
andros.description: Southwest coast with natural windbreaks. Sandy beach.

kea.name: Koundouros Beach
kea.description: Southwest bay completely sheltered from northern winds. Multiple coves.

kea.name: Pisses Beach
kea.description: West coast with good Meltemi protection. Ancient ruins nearby.

kea.name: Spathi Beach
kea.description: Remote southeast beach with excellent protection. Worth the drive.

kythnos.name: Kolona Beach
kythnos.description: Double-sided beach, choose the sheltered side during Meltemi. Unique formation.

kythnos.name: Episkopi Beach
kythnos.description: Southeast bay with natural wind protection. Sandy beach.

kythnos.name: Flambouria Beach
kythnos.description: South coast hideaway, perfect during strong winds. Peaceful.

amorgos.name: Agia Anna Beach
amorgos.description: South coast below famous Monastery, excellent protection from Meltemi.

amorgos.name: Mouros Beach
amorgos.description: East coast with some wind exposure. Scenic location.

amorgos.name: Kalotaritissa Bay
amorgos.description: Southwest bay with shipwreck. Complete wind protection.

folegandros.name: Angali Beach
folegandros.description: South coast protected by high cliffs from Meltemi. Turquoise waters.

folegandros.name: Livadaki Beach
folegandros.description: Hidden cove with excellent Meltemi shelter. Crystal clear waters.

folegandros.name: Katergo Beach
folegandros.description: Remote beach accessible by boat or hike. Perfect wind protection.

serifos.name: Psili Ammos
serifos.description: South coast golden beach, perfectly sheltered from Meltemi. Fine sand.

serifos.name: Livadakia Beach
serifos.description: Port beach with harbor protection from all winds. Easy access.

serifos.name: Ganema Beach
serifos.description: West coast with moderate wind exposure. Popular beach.

sifnos.name: Platis Gialos
sifnos.description: South coast bay with excellent Meltemi protection. Long sandy beach.

sifnos.name: Faros Beach
sifnos.description: Southeast coast with lighthouse, some wind protection. Three connected beaches.

sifnos.name: Vathy Beach
sifnos.description: Southwest bay completely sheltered during Meltemi. Traditional pottery village.

sikinos.name: Alopronia Beach
sikinos.description: Port bay with excellent protection from northern winds. Relaxed atmosphere.

sikinos.name: Agios Georgios
sikinos.description: East coast with some Meltemi exposure. Sandy beach.

sikinos.name: Santorineika
sikinos.description: Southwest beach with good wind protection. Remote location.

antiparos.name: Psaraliki Beach
antiparos.description: Southwest coast completely protected from Meltemi. Family beach.

antiparos.name: Soros Beach
antiparos.description: South coast with partial wind protection. Popular spot.

antiparos.name: Agios Spiridonas
antiparos.description: West coast bay sheltered from northern winds. Quiet beach.

koufonisia.name: Pori Beach
koufonisia.description: South coast with moderate Meltemi exposure. Natural pools.

koufonisia.name: Fanos Beach
koufonisia.description: Southwest bay with good wind protection. Pristine waters.

koufonisia.name: Platia Pounta
koufonisia.description: East coast - very exposed to all winds. Swimming pools in rocks.

kimolos.name: Prassa Beach
kimolos.description: Southwest coast with white sand, excellent Meltemi shelter. Unique white rocks.

kimolos.name: Bonatsa Beach
kimolos.description: South coast with some wind protection. Clear waters.

kimolos.name: Aliki Beach
kimolos.description: Northeast coast - avoid during strong Meltemi. Salt lake behind beach.

rhodes.name: Lindos Beach
rhodes.description: Famous bay below Acropolis, excellent protection from all winds. Historic setting.

rhodes.name: Anthony Quinn Bay
rhodes.description: Sheltered cove on east coast, perfect during Meltemi. Crystal waters.

rhodes.name: Tsambika Beach
rhodes.description: East coast golden beach with partial wind protection. Monastery above.

rhodes.name: Prasonisi
rhodes.description: Windsurfing paradise - very windy, avoid for swimming during Meltemi.

kos.name: Kefalos Beach
kos.description: Southwest peninsula with moderate Meltemi exposure. Sandy beach.

kos.name: Paradise Beach
kos.description: South coast with volcanic rocks providing wind shelter. Bubble beach.

kos.name: Agios Stefanos
kos.description: Southwest bay with ancient ruins and wind protection. Island view.

patmos.name: Psili Ammos
patmos.description: South coast golden beach, completely sheltered from Meltemi. Isolated paradise.

patmos.name: Agriolivado Beach
patmos.description: Southwest coast with good wind protection. Organized beach.

patmos.name: Kampi Beach
patmos.description: West coast bay perfect during strong winds. Rock formations.

leros.name: Vromolithos Beach
leros.description: Southwest bay with perfect Meltemi protection. Sandy beach.

leros.name: Panteli Beach
leros.description: West coast fishing village bay, well protected. Traditional tavernas.

kalymnos.name: Myrties Beach
kalymnos.description: West coast facing Telendos, excellent wind protection. Sunset views.

kalymnos.name: Masouri Beach
kalymnos.description: West coast with dramatic cliffs providing shelter. Rock climbing area.

lesbos.name: Skala Eressos
lesbos.description: Southwest coast with excellent protection from northern winds. Long beach.

lesbos.name: Vatera Beach
lesbos.description: South coast long sandy beach with wind protection. 7km of sand.

chios.name: Mavra Volia
chios.description: Southwest volcanic beach, excellent Meltemi shelter. Black pebbles.

chios.name: Lithi Beach
chios.description: Southwest coast completely protected from northern winds. Quiet beach.

samos.name: Psili Ammos
samos.description: Southwest peninsula, completely sheltered from Meltemi. Fine sand beach.

samos.name: Potokaki Beach
samos.description: South coast near airport, good wind protection. Long beach.

lemnos.name: Plathena Beach
lemnos.description: Southwest coast with excellent wind protection. Shallow waters.

lemnos.name: Keros Beach
lemnos.description: Southwest bay sheltered from northern winds. Kitesurfing spot.

thasos.name: Aliki Beach
thasos.description: Southeast double bay with ancient marble quarries, excellent wind protection.

thasos.name: Paradise Beach
thasos.description: South coast with partial wind shelter. Popular beach.

thasos.name: Marble Beach
thasos.description: Southeast coast with unique marble formations providing wind shelter.

crete.name: Balos Lagoon
crete.description: Northwest lagoon completely protected from all winds by peninsula. Paradise beach.

crete.name: Elafonissi Beach
crete.description: Southwest pink sand lagoon, excellent wind protection. Shallow waters.

crete.name: Falassarna Beach
crete.description: West coast with some Meltemi exposure but famous sunsets. Big waves possible.

crete.name: Preveli Beach
crete.description: South coast palm forest river beach, completely sheltered. Unique landscape.

skiathos.name: Koukounaries Beach
skiathos.description: Southwest golden beach backed by pine forest, excellent wind protection.

skiathos.name: Banana Beach
skiathos.description: South coast beach with excellent shelter from northern winds. Two sections.

skiathos.name: Lalaria Beach
skiathos.description: North coast white pebble beach - very exposed to Meltemi. Boat access only.

skopelos.name: Kastani Beach
skopelos.description: Southwest Mamma Mia beach, excellent protection from northern winds.

skopelos.name: Panormos Beach
skopelos.description: Northwest bay completely sheltered from Meltemi. Pine trees.

skopelos.name: Agnontas Beach
skopelos.description: Southeast fishing village bay, well protected. Traditional atmosphere.
